name: Robotroop
description:
Robotroop is a top down shooter game whose objective is to get out of the laboratory where you are, several enemies will try to prevent you from reaching the goal.

but you are not alone, you will meet a lot of friends along the way! 

We are a small team made up of 4 university students, more updates will open soon.

Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/robotroopgame/

Twitter: https://www.instagram.com/robotroopgame/?hl=es
